issue.title: www.animeworld.so
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://www.animeworld.so/play/rent-a-girlfriend-3.pD0MJ/iM4qtB](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.animeworld.so%2Fplay%2Frent-a-girlfriend-3.pD0MJ%2FiM4qtB) ### Comment > After about 1 minute you view and stay in any anime page such as: https://www.animeworld.so/play/rent-a-girlfriend-3.pD0MJ/yvbm9y and similar, if you click anywhere on the page, new tabs with advertising open, or, the page of the anime turns into an advertisement and in a new tab it opens the anime's pages and this thing repeats itself every minute, it has become a nightmare to navigate on that site. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/s2f6ae5ir74o4cwwwgcgoss88kww0o4myzdjdrbj9c.png?nc=1)

comment.body: Actually we already have `%2Fwf%2Fopen%3Fupn%3D$image` too, closing. Please report only those actually unblocked.

issue.title: connect.intuit.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://connect.intuit.com/t/scs-v1-351a4b3296604fec8b579cbdb38fe5e571b17b343eed4b429389a165bf58a43439659bdc663c498a9525a8d183a70e2a?cta=viewinvoicenow&locale=en_US](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fconnect.intuit.com%2Ft%2Fscs-v1-351a4b3296604fec8b579cbdb38fe5e571b17b343eed4b429389a165bf58a43439659bdc663c498a9525a8d183a70e2a%3Fcta%3Dviewinvoicenow%26locale%3Den_US) ### Comment > On the following link, when paying a bill on Intuit using my bank info, the payment fails when submitting with Ad Guard on.
